message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $1,400,000 is a significant drop from my initial asking price. This product offers immense value, and I believe a price of $1,650,000 is a fair compromise that reflects its worth.
I understand that the product has value, but $1,650,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing a price of $1,500,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
